decks.notes: This combo deck focuses on generating mana quickly through cards like Seething Song and Rite of Flame, while also using cards like Jeska's Will and Manamorphose to filter through the deck and draw into key pieces. Once enough mana is generated, the deck aims to cast powerful spells like Elemental Eruption or Galvanic Relay to finish off the opponent. Burning Wish is used to fetch specific combo pieces from the sideboard to further enhance the deck's win condition. Overall, the deck is designed to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with explosive plays.

This deck focuses on using the combination of Nomads en-Kor and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to create an infinite mana loop that allows you to draw your entire deck and win the game. It also includes disruption cards like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to protect your combo and control the game. Teferi, Time Raveler helps to slow down your opponent's plays and Boseiju, Who Endures ensures your key spells can't be countered. This deck is all about setting up your combo while disrupting your opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on controlling the game with a combination of counterspells, removal, and disruptive enchantments like Back to Basics. Stoneforge Mystic and equipment like Batterskull or Kaldra Compleat provide threats while Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor offer card advantage and versatility. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the control elements and provide consistent access to the different colors needed for spells. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a strong board presence to eventually win the game.

The main idea of this deck revolves around controlling the opponent's resources while ramping up your own lands. By utilizing cards like Exploration, Life from the Loam, and Crop Rotation, you can quickly assemble powerful lands like Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage to create a lethal 20/20 token. Additionally, cards like Wasteland and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale hinder your opponent's board development, while also utilizing cards like Sylvan Library and Maze of Ith for card advantage and protection. This deck aims to grind out the opponent with powerful land interactions and control elements.

The main focus of this deck is to use the combo of Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill opponents' decks. By using cards like Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to search for and recur the combo pieces, the deck aims to disrupt opponents' strategies and win through a quick mill victory. Cards like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast provide disruptive control elements, while cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Lotus Petal help generate the necessary mana to execute the combo efficiently. Additionally, cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Soul-Guide Lantern offer graveyard disruption against opposing strategies.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, utilizing the Deadguy Ale archetype. It focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Spirit of the Labyrinth while also presenting a fast clock with creatures like Stoneforge Mystic and Emperor of Bones. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in the deck's game plan. The mana base is built to support the deck's aggressive strategy while also providing access to powerful white and black spells.

The main idea of this Death & Taxes Legacy deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan by playing taxing creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and disruptive cards like Phyrexian Revoker. Using Aether Vial to cheat in creatures at instant speed and Stoneforge Mystic to tutor up powerful equipment like Kaldra Compleat, this deck aims to apply pressure while keeping your opponent off balance with cards like Flickerwisp and Karakas. Wasteland and Rishadan Port help to control your opponent's mana base, while Mother of Runes provides protection for your key creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to use unblockable creatures like Changeling Outcast and Ingenious Infiltrator to consistently deal damage to the opponent. The deck also utilizes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out to control the board and protect its creatures. Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow is a key card that can deal significant damage when ninjutsu'd in. The deck includes counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its game plan, while also including card selection spells like Ponder and Brainstorm to ensure consistency.

The deck focuses on using Cloudpost to ramp up mana quickly and efficiently, allowing for the casting of powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog. Crop Rotation and Vesuva help search for key lands like Eye of Ugin and Karakas. Karn, the Great Creator provides utility and disruption, while Sowing Mycospawn and Kozilek's Command offer control options. The deck also includes cards like Disruptor Flute and Vexing Bauble for additional synergy and disruption. Overall, the deck aims to ramp up quickly, control the board, and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.
